analysis.description: C3Coin.isContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x16d9306c93a37ae3954efe211262ab6e7579acc0.sol#270-277) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x16d9306c93a37ae3954efe211262ab6e7579acc0.sol:
	Contract C3Coin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x16d9306c93a37ae3954efe211262ab6e7579acc0.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
tkn in ERC223ReceivingContract.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x16d9306c93a37ae3954efe211262ab6e7579acc0.sol#54) is a local variable never initialiazed

C3Coin.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/10/0x16d9306c93a37ae3954efe211262ab6e7579acc0.sol#270-277)
	- /unique_chucks/10/0x16d9306c93a37ae3954efe211262ab6e7579acc0.sol#275-277
